MENU

Venue

SIGCOMM 2017 will take place on University of California, Los Angeles campus in UCLA Meyer and Renee Luskin Conference Center located in the heart of the campus.

You can download UCLA the offline campus map or access the interactive map.

Getting to Conference Venue

The conference center is just 12 miles from Los Angeles Internation Airport (LAX).

Venue address:

UCLA Meyer & Renee Luskin Conference Center
425 Westwood Plaza
Los Angeles 90095
